item.title: Changes in Blog Buzz Machine
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I launched a new version of Blog Buzz Machine last night. Right now I've stripped the interface of all the prior data I was displaying and am sticking to just the search aspect of the site. I dig the cleaner look. Let me know how you like it.
item.excerpt:encoded: I launched a new version of Blog Buzz Machine last night. Right now I've stripped the interface of all the prior data I was displaying and am sticking to just the search aspect of the site. I dig the cleaner look. Let me know how you like it.
